Posts.Content: I'm so sorry to hear this Linda. I have been through this and regrettably did not make that tough decision. Even though the vet gave me injectable pain med to give our dog, it was a horrible experience and if I had to do it again, I'd have the vet put her out of her misery. It is such a difficult decision. You, your dog and your family will be in my prayers.
Posts.Title: my dog has cancer
